thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Japan’s Aeon to Invest in Online Retailer Boxed.com

author: Megumi Fujikawa
title: Japan’s Aeon to Invest in Online Retailer Boxed.com
text:
TOKYO—Aeon Co., Japan’s biggest retailer by sales, is following the trend of tapping a startup for e-commerce expertise with a plan to invest in Boxed.com, which sells household items in bulk online.
The investment, set to be completed by mid-May, would make Aeon one of the top shareholders of New York-based Boxed, said people involved in the deal. They declined to provide financial details.
Aeon...
